Administrator - Class in objects
The Administrator class is a representation of a school administrator.

This constructor builds a new administrator, as the ID is randomized.
Administrator(String, String, String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class objects.Administrator
This constructor builds an existing administrator, as the ID along with the other fields are set by the program parameters from the user.
